title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin describes the current state of the Bears after a disappointing performance against the Vikings and why they need move forward into the future and stop living in the past. He praises Derek Carr for what he's accomplished with the Raiders despite the organizational dysfunction he's dealt with for years. Colin shares his top 10 NFL teams for week 15 of the season. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to discuss the Chiefs and why they are the team to beat in the AFC right now. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
